quotes.quote: There is no fate that cannot be surmounted by scorn.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: To punish me for my contempt for authority, fate made me an authority myself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on all men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A man's character is his fate.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: The fates have given mankind a patient soul.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Talent and intelligence never yet inoculated anyone against the caprice of the fates.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Fate chooses your relations, you choose your friends.
quotes.author: Jacques Delille

quotes.quote: Man is his own star and the soul that can render an honest and perfect man commands all light, all influence, all fate.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: That consciousness is everything and that all things begin with a thought. That we are responsible for our own fate, we reap what we sow, we get what we give, we pull in what we put out. I know these things for sure.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Maybe our mistakes are what make our fate. Without them, what would shape our lives? Perhaps, if we never veered off course, we wouldn't fall in love or have babies or be who we are.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Whatever limits us, we call Fate.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Fate rules the affairs of mankind with no recognizable order.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: While the fates permit, live happily; life speeds on with hurried step, and with winged days the wheel of the headlong year is turned.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: I am not an adventurer by choice but by fate.
quotes.author: William McFee

quotes.quote: If fate means you to lose, give him a good fight anyhow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Men at some time are the masters of their fates: The fault, dear Brutus, is not in our stars, but in ourselves, that we are underlings.
